db:abstract.db:para: Defines a linear attenuation curve for a Sound.

db:para.db:emphasis: This type is under development and is subject to change.

db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: AttenuationModelLinear must be defined inside AudioEngine or be added to it using AudioEngine.addAttenuationModel() if AttenuationModelLinear is created dynamically.

db:section.db:title: end : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the end distance. There will be no sound hearable if the distance from sound to listener is larger than this. The default value is 1.

db:section.db:title: name : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the name of AttenuationModelLinear, must be unique among all attenuation models and only defined once.

db:section.db:title: start : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the start distance. There will be no attenuation if the distance from sound to listener is within this range. The default value is 0.
